mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.hosId AS "hosId", a.unit_code AS "unitCode", a.unit_name AS "unitName", a.input_code AS "inputCode", a.address AS "address", a.unit_type AS "unitType", a.subordinate_to AS "subordinateTo", a.distance_to_hospital AS "distanceToHospital", a.regular_num AS "regularNum", a.temp_num AS "tempNum", a.retired_num AS "retiredNum", a.input_code_wb AS "inputCodeWb", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO unit_in_contract( id, hosId, unit_code, unit_name, input_code, address, unit_type, subordinate_to, distance_to_hospital, regular_num, temp_num, retired_num, input_code_wb, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{hosId}, #{unitCode}, #{unitName}, #{inputCode}, #{address}, #{unitType}, #{subordinateTo}, #{distanceToHospital}, #{regularNum}, #{tempNum}, #{retiredNum}, #{inputCodeWb}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE unit_in_contract SET hosId = #{hosId}, unit_code = #{unitCode}, unit_name = #{unitName}, input_code = #{inputCode}, address = #{address}, unit_type = #{unitType}, subordinate_to = #{subordinateTo}, distance_to_hospital = #{distanceToHospital}, regular_num = #{regularNum}, temp_num = #{tempNum}, retired_num = #{retiredNum}, input_code_wb = #{inputCodeWb}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
